explains: n. 英镑（英国货币）；标准纯银
adj. 优秀的；（银）标准纯度的；英币的；纯银制的
wordGroup: sterling silver 标准纯银，法定纯度银制成品

sentences.en: Sterling continues to gain ground against the dollar.
sentences.cn: 英镑对美元的比价继续坚挺。

sentences.en: You can be paid in pounds sterling or American dollars.
sentences.cn: 可以付你英镑，也可以付你美元。

sentences.en: Sterling has been hit by the economy's failure to pull out of recession.
sentences.cn: 由于经济没能摆脱衰退，英镑遭受了重创。
